channel.title: Ka Ian Chan
channel.description: Recent content on Ka Ian Chan

item.title: Feature Engineering with Stepwise Regression
item.description: Introduction When I was studying statistics, I noticed an algorithm called “stepwise regression”. Generally, this is a method that ranks features based on their importances and finds out how important each feature is to the prediction. The following coding will show the process of finding the features importances. (Assumed that this is a binary classification) Please note that this is the translated post of my original post in CSDN (Original

item.title: Creating my Website
item.description: I want a website I wanted to have my own personal website for a long time. I have tried to create a website many times. I tried to have my own website on 000webhostapp, hostinger and gihub with HTML and CSS, but these designs are usually so simple and unsatisfactory for me. Now I really want to build a new one! I am building this website with Hugo. This is
關於我 大家好，我希望你是認識我的。若不認識也沒關係，你可以在這裡認識我！ 教育背景 2022-現在 PhD in Computer Applied Technology @ MPU 2020-2022 MSc in Big Data and IoT @ MPU 2016-2020 BSc in Computing - Computer Education

Note for My Life I want to have a page to record my life (or whatever I want to say here). 2023 08 October - Finally, I have my own website! 06 October - I received an email about awarding a scholarship for 2022/2023. I am really surprised! 11 September - My new paper is accepted by TALE2023!
